title: Double-Headed Loss
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Pablo Torre discuss If the Astro’s sweeping the Yankees in a double header means anything, if the Nationals should trade Juan Soto, and if they’re betting on Shohei Otani or Max Scherzer. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Yankees lose a double header to the Astros and should the Nationals trade Juan Soto?
